channel.title: Items for trade, LF monster drops
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Items for trade, LF monster drops" - Kaiju drops, Mantis Rune and Wheel items for other drops and possibly SBP.

item.title: Re: Items for trade, LF monster drops
item.content:encoded: Magical Wand traded for Rotating Timespheres. Still looking for those Kaiju drops and Storybook Pages.

item.title: Items for trade, LF monster drops and Timespheres
item.content:encoded:
I have a few spares for trade.

Have:

Book of Spoilers
Mantis Rune
Codec
Stealth Suit
Lovelove Paradise
K-Dog's Headband
Necklace of the First HoCage
25 Fur Squares

Looking for:

Perfect Hair
Carapace Armor
Monkey Cymbals
Storybook Pages

No runes, I'm already Rune Encrusted. No smoke bombs either.
